name: Dice it Up (DDRKirby(ISQ))
description:
Dice it Up v1.02
by DDRKirby(ISQ) and Kat Jia
Released under the Cocoa Moss label

This game was created in 48 hours as our entry for GMTK Game Jam 2022.   The theme was "Roll of the Dice".

"Dice it Up" is a cooking game based on rolling dice!

  • Combine dice each turn to form dishes, but be careful: you need to finish a dish entirely in a single turn!
  • Fire-roasted meat gets bonus points when used in a dish!  Your trusty sous chef will man the fire pit if you give them some meat.
  • Use golden keys to unlock magical spices and special cutting equipment!
  • Accumulate as many coins as you can before the shift is over!

If you're clever, you may find other hidden strategies as well...
